topic: Active Learning That Works: ICAP and the Evidence from STEM Classrooms
target_audience: university instructors and HS teachers; curriculum leads

refs.content: Engagement hierarchy (Passive < Active < Constructive < Interactive) predicts learning outcomes; concrete behaviors for each level.
Across 225+ studies, active learning raises exam performance and reduces failure rates vs. traditional lecturing.

special_instructions: Map common activities to ICAP levels; provide 10 ready-to-teach active tasks with assessment rubrics.
